text: Loneliness consumes me  therapist won t even answer  I just want endless restLoneliness is something i ve dealt with my whole life  but as i get older it s just becoming unbearable  I feel so trapped in my own mind especially at night and I have little to nobody who can help me with it  The idea of therapy does not even work for me  I ve tried so many therapists throughout my life but what does help me is HAVING SOMEONE TO TALK TO  I try to reach out to her outside of sessions and nothing  I m so lost and absolutely TRAPPED in my own mind
